column1: #Text=I notice the author doesn't answer his own question.
#Text=Probably because the answer is clearly NO.
#Text=A yes answer would be indefensible so he would rather leave it unanswered an imply that maybe it is yes.
#Text=It is clearly no because it applies to all foreigners and it is clearly no because Chinese Canadians do not have to pay it.
#Text=I expect better from a UBC Prof than attempting to stir up racial grevances.
